entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
